com.vaadin.event.LayoutEvents.LayoutClickNotifier, com.vaadin.event.MethodEventSource, com.vaadin.server.ClientConnector, com.vaadin.server.Sizeable, com.vaadin.shared.Connector, com.vaadin.ui.Component, com.vaadin.ui.ComponentContainer, com.vaadin.ui.HasComponents, com.vaadin.ui.HasComponents.ComponentAttachDetachNotifier, com.vaadin.ui.Layout, com.vaadin.ui.Layout.AlignmentHandler, com.vaadin.ui.Layout.MarginHandler, com.vaadin.ui.Layout.SpacingHandler, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<com.vaadin.ui.Component>
public class Pager
extends com.vaadin.ui.HorizontalLayout

Author:
Paul Withers

Component to provide a pager sizes selector (5, 10, 25, 50) and page navigation buttons (Prev, 1-5, Next).
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

Pager

public Pager()
Constructor

Pager

public Pager(ViewWrapper wrappedView,
             java.util.List<Pager.Sizes> availSizes)
Overloaded constructor, allowing passing of the ViewWrapper this pager maps to and page sizes to allow switching between.

Parameters:
wrappedView - ViewWrapper through which the pager should navigate
availSizes - List page sizes user can select, defaulting to 5, 10, 25 if null is passed
Method Detail

loadContent

public void loadContent()
Load the pager components

loadPagerSizesButtons

public com.vaadin.ui.HorizontalLayout loadPagerSizesButtons()
Load pager sizes buttons

Returns:
HorizontalLayout containing the pager sizes buttons

updatePagerSizeButtonStyles

public void updatePagerSizeButtonStyles()
Update styles (adding or removing "selected" style) depending on whether or not each pager button is selected

loadPagerPagesButtons

public void loadPagerPagesButtons()
Load pages buttons - Prev, page numbers, Next.

If current page is 3 or less, the first page number displayed will be 1. Otherwise, if available page is less than current page + 2, the first page number will be available pages - 4. Otherwise, the first page number will be current page - 2.

updatePagerPagesButtonStyles

public void updatePagerPagesButtonStyles()
Update styles on pages buttons. Prev is disabled if on page 1. Next is disabled if at end of view. Current page is disabled, all others enabled.
